_description: Comprehensive Customer Service Chatbot Intents - 26 categories covering all common customer service scenarios

responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! Welcome to our customer service. What can I help you with?
Hey! Thanks for reaching out. How can I help?
Good to see you! What brings you here today?
Welcome! I'm here to help. What do you need?
Our pricing varies depending on the product. Could you tell me which product you're interested in?
I'd be happy to help with pricing! Which item would you like to know about?
For specific pricing, could you let me know which product you're inquiring about?
We offer competitive pricing. Which product can I get pricing information for?
I can help with pricing! What product are you interested in?
I'd be happy to help track your order! Could you provide your order number?
To check your order status, I'll need your order number. Can you provide that?
Let me help you track that! What's your order number?
I can find your order details. Do you have your order number handy?
To track your order, I'll need the order number. What is it?
We want you to be happy! Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Would you like details on the return process?
We offer hassle-free returns within 30 days. What do you need help with?
You can return items within 30 days for a full refund. Would you like step-by-step instructions?
Returns are easy! We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. How can I help with yours?
Our 30-day return policy makes it simple. What would you like to return?
Shipping costs depend on your location and the items ordered. Standard shipping is free on orders over $50!
We offer multiple shipping options! Standard shipping is free for orders over $50. Would you like more details?
Yes, we ship nationwide! Free standard shipping on orders over $50. Express options available too.
Great question! We have free standard shipping for orders over $50, plus express options.
Our shipping is affordable! Orders over $50 get free standard shipping. Other options available.
We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Your payment is fully encrypted and secure.
We take credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and digital wallets. All transactions are 100% secure.
Multiple payment options are available! Credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay are all accepted.
We support all major payment methods including cards, PayPal, and digital wallets for your convenience.
You can pay with any major credit card, PayPal, or digital payment methods. Checkout is secure.
I'm here to help! What do you need assistance with?
Absolutely! I'm ready to help. What's your question?
Of course! I can help with orders, returns, shipping, pricing, and more. What do you need?
I'm your AI assistant. I can help with most common questions. What would you like to know?
Happy to assist! What can I help you with today?
I'd love to help with product information! Which product would you like to know more about?
Which product are you interested in? I can provide detailed information.
To give you the best product details, which item would you like to learn about?
I can help! What product would you like more information on?
What product would you like details about? I'm here to help!
I can help with account-related questions! What do you need help with?
For account issues, what specifically do you need assistance with?
I'm here to help with your account. What's the issue?
What's happening with your account? I can help troubleshoot.
Tell me what you need help with regarding your account.
Goodbye! Thanks for using our service. Have a great day!
Thanks for visiting! Feel free to come back anytime you need help.
Take care! We appreciate your business. Come back soon!
Bye! Thanks for reaching out. We're here whenever you need us.
See you later! Thank you for being a valued customer.
I'm sorry to hear that. We want to make it right. Can you tell me more about what happened?
We apologize for your experience. Please describe the issue so we can help.
I'm sorry you're experiencing an issue. Let's work together to resolve it. What's the problem?
We take complaints seriously. Please tell me what went wrong so we can fix it.
I'm sorry to hear about your problem. Can you give me more details so we can resolve this?

patterns: What's the status of my order
I want to track my order
responses: I can help you track your order! Please provide your order number (e.g., ORD-2026-001).
To track your order, please share your order number with me.
I'd be happy to check the status of your order. What's your order number?
I can help with account issues! Are you trying to reset your password or create a new account?
What account issue can I help you with?
I'm here to help with login and account problems. What's going on?
Let me assist. Are you having trouble signing in?
We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Any other payment questions?
We accept most major payment methods including Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and mobile wallets.
We support multiple payment options. What would work best for you?

patterns: Do you have a discount code
responses: Great question! We regularly have promotions. Visit our website or subscribe to our newsletter for the latest codes.
We offer seasonal discounts and promo codes. Would you like info on current offers?
Check our website homepage for current promotional codes. We also email exclusive deals to subscribers!
We're available online 24/7! For specific support hours or store location, please visit our website.
Our website is available 24/7. For customer support hours, check our contact page.
You can shop anytime! Our support team is available during business hours. What do you need?
You can reach us via email at support@company.com or phone at 1-800-COMPANY. You can also chat with us here!
We're available via email, phone, and this chat. What's the best way to help you?
Visit our contact page for phone and email options. I'm also here to help right now!
I can help! Or you can contact support@company.com for more complex issues.

patterns: I want to talk to a person
responses: I'm happy to help! But if you'd prefer to speak with someone, our team is available during business hours. Would you like contact info?
You can request a live agent during business hours. Let me know if I can solve this for you first!
Our live agents are available 9AM-9PM EST. For now, tell me what you need and I'll do my best to help.
Most products come with a 1-year limited warranty. Would you like details on coverage?
Warranty details vary by product. Which item are you asking about?
We offer standard coverage on most items. What product do you need info on?
For bulk or wholesale orders, please contact our business team at sales@company.com or call 1-800-COMPANY ext. 102.
We do offer volume discounts! Contact our sales team for a custom quote.
Great! For large orders, our sales team can provide special pricing.
Check our FAQ section on the website for common questions and answers.
I can answer most questions! What would you like to know?
What's your question? I can probably help!
Yes, we can exchange items! Do you have the wrong size or color? Let me help.
We absolutely offer exchanges. What would you like to exchange it for?
I can help with an exchange. What's wrong with the current item?

patterns: Will it be back in stock
responses: I can check availability. Which product are you interested in?
Let me look that up for you. What item are you asking about?
I can help with stock info. What product would you like to check?
Yes! We offer digital and physical gift cards. Would you like to purchase one or check a balance?
We have gift cards available in various amounts. Interested?
You can purchase a gift card on our website or check your balance there.
Great! Subscribing to our newsletter gives you first access to sales and new products. You can sign up on our website!
Subscribers get exclusive deals and early access. Visit our website to sign up!
Love the idea! Head to our website's footer to subscribe to our newsletter.
If your order hasn't shipped yet, we can update the address. Do you have your order number?
I can help change your shipping address if the order hasn't left our warehouse. What's your order number?
Let me check if we can still modify your address. Please provide your order number.
I can help with setup! Which product are you setting up? I can provide instructions.
Setup guides are usually included. Which product do you need help with?
I'd be happy to help! What product needs assembly?

patterns: How do I know what size
responses: I can help with sizing! Do you have the product dimensions or need a size chart?
Let me find the size chart for you. Which product are you asking about?
We have detailed sizing information. What item are you looking at?
